title: 9p separate two blocks for sale at Jambugasmulla road, Nugegoda
details:
18p land is available for sale as two separate blocks or one entire block
Situated in high residential area
All amenities are close nearby
Walking distance to High-level road,
Walking distance to Anula, Samudra devi Balika, Lyceum, Royal Institute and other reputed schools in Nugegoda city
